title: Can anyone tell me if there is an online portal for google product support?
content:
The glass on the back of my pixel 4 is peeling off and I'm struggling to find a support contact for assistance.  It seems like the "help pages" have been designed to frustrate customers in a circular loop of links that never get to a number, email or online webchat support service.

I'm hoping someone has managed to find an online webchat service that they can share?

Thanks in advance.

Lee (from New Zealand)
